valid_queries: SELECT id, name FROM users WHERE active = true
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM orders GROUP BY status
write_operations: UPDATE users SET active = false WHERE id = 1
ALTER TABLE users ADD COLUMN age INT
GRANT SELECT ON users TO analyst
REVOKE INSERT ON users FROM user
dangerous_patterns: SELECT * FROM users UNION SELECT * FROM admins
common_mistakes: SELECT * FROM users WHERE name = NULL

query_types.query: ALTER TABLE users ADD COLUMN age
WITH data AS (SELECT 1) SELECT * FROM data
